member.name: M:MCDir.Form1.CopyFiles(System.Int32)
member.summary: This is a method that copies files in the chosen directory into the backup location
member.param: This parameter is used to pick the correct folder directory when copying files over

member.name: M:MCDir.Form1.CopyDirectories(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This sub copies folder directories over to the backup location and uses recursion to call itself so that it looks at directories in itself and also calls CopyFiles to copy the files over in those directories
member.param: This parameter holds the folder location
This parameter holds the count used to add more directories into the hashtable and used so that it creates a unique ID for each folder
this parameter is used a marker so that it adds the correct folder directory path
